amendment.description: Amendments en bloc sought to exempt from the provisions of the bill Federal regulations that pertain to investor protection, the safe and sound operation of financial markets, federally insured depository institutions or their deposit insurance funds.
amendment.purpose: An amendment (comprised of two amendments offered en bloc, one of which is numbered 84 as printed in the Congressional Record and the other submitted on Jan. 27 and not printed) to provide for exclusion from the bill any federal mandates that pertain to the protection of investors, financial markets, federally insured banks and credit unions, and deposit insurance funds.

action.text: On agreeing to the Kanjorski amendments (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 154 - 266 (Roll no. 53).
